formElement.label: Configuration Name:
formElement.documentation: Name of the configuration to be used. URL, port and credentials are retrieved from the given configuration. To view or create a new configuration, go to the Administration -> Plugins tab, and select 'Configure' action for @PLUGIN_KEY@ plugin.
formElement.htmlDocumentation: Name of the configuration to be used. URL, port and credentials are retrieved from the given configuration.

formElement.label: Messaging System Type:
formElement.documentation: The name of the messaging provider. Pass in either WMQ or SIB.

formElement.label: Scope of the Connection Factory:
formElement.documentation: Scope of the WebSphere messaging provider at which the Connection Factory is to be deleted.

formElement.label: Connection Factory Administrative Name:
formElement.documentation: The administrative name assigned to this Connection Factory.
